```{r, include = FALSE}
  collapse = TRUE,

library(ggplot2)
library(emphatic)
```



```{r setup}
library(ggplot2)
library(emphatic)
options(HL_DARK = FALSE)
```


```{r}
sea_ice_area
```


First Iteration with `{emphatic}`
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
sea_ice_area |>
  hl_mat(colour = scale_color_viridis_c(option = 'A')) |>
  hl_adjust(na = '', text_contrast = 0.4)
```



Second Iteration with `{emphatic}`
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
sea_ice_area |>
  hl_mat(colour = scale_color_viridis_c(option = 'D'), selection = row(.x) %in% c(5, 40)) |>
  hl_adjust(na = '')
```
